#### Workspace set-up ####
```{r}
library(knitr)
library(janitor)

library(tidyverse)
```
### Simulate data ###
```{r}
set.seed(853)

simulated_height_data <-
  tibble(
    name =
      c(
        rep("Ash", 4),
        rep("Jacki", 4),
        rep("Matt", 4),
        rep("Mike", 4),
        rep("Rol", 4)
      ),
    height =
      runif(
        n = 20,
        min = 4.0,
        max = 7.0
        
      )
  )
head(simulated_height_data)
```
